item.title: Check for Active Drupal Contrib Modules
item.description: Use the command: ~$ drush pml --no-core --status=Enabled See sample below: ~$ drush pml --no-core --status=Enabled ----------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------- --------- ----------------- Package Name Status Version ----------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------- --------- ----------------- Field types Address (address) Enabled 8.x-1.8 Administration Admin Toolbar (admin_toolbar) Enabled 8.x-2.3 Administration Admin Toolbar Extra Tools (admin_toolbar_tools) Enabled 8.x-2.3 Spam control Antibot (antibot) Enabled 8.x-1.4 Entity Automatic Entity Labels (auto_entitylabel) Enabled 8.x-3.0-beta3 Content Display Calendar Link (calendar_link) Enabled 8.x-1.1 Other Component Libraries (components) Enabled 8.
